solution_line_template: If {slices_per_person} slices are sufficient for a meal to feed a single person, then to feed {family_members} Thelma will need {family_members}*{slices_per_person}=<<{slices_per_person}*{family_members}={total_slices_needed}>>{total_slices_needed} slices of tomato.

At {slices_per_tomato} slices per tomato, Thelma will need {total_slices_needed}/{slices_per_tomato}=<<{total_slices_needed}/{slices_per_tomato}={total_tomatoes_needed}>>{total_tomatoes_needed} tomatoes to feed a family of 8.
